about.title: About Olive Tree
about.description: At Olive Tree, we believe real food comes from real farms. That's why we work with trusted local growers across Cyprus to deliver seasonal, sustainable produce straight to your door. No middlemen, no chemicals – just honest food that's good for you. Let us take the hassle out of shopping so you can spend more time enjoying fresh, delicious meals with the people you love.
